name: C++ Template Classes of MVL
short_description: C++ template classes for Multi-Value Logic support arbitrary precision and user defined Multi-Value Logic types. This library comes with pre-defined data types: integer, boolean, bit, logic, std_logic, bit_vector,  logic_vector and std_logic_vector.
